general.gigTitle: design modern html landing page or website development

sellerCard.oneLiner: Professional Frontend Developer and UI UX Designer
sellerCard.description:
With over 5 years of professional experience in HTML, CSS, JS, Next JS, React JS, Bootstrap, Figma and XD, I am highly dedicated about designing and coding responsive websites and high converting landing pages.

I love exploring new ideas and making them happen in real life.

Check out the range of services I offer below. For any custom inquiries, feel free to press the black contact button nearby.

description.content:
Outdated landing pages are no longer deliver the conversions you expect, and design trends are always changing. I design and develop high converting HTML landing pages that follow current trends and produce outcomes.


Over the last 4+ years, I have professionally completed over 350+ projects for various brands. I am expert in creative web design & development using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, Next.js, React.js, NodeJS, Laravel, PHP, and Figma(for UI/UX). Checkout my most impressive works in my portfolio!


Solutions I offer:

  • Landing Page
  • UI/UX on Figma
  • Figma to HTML/React.JS/Next.JS
  • Parallax Landing page
  • Website Development
  • Modern and responsive layout
  • Scroll animations
  • Complex CSS/JS coding


Benefits:

  • Fluent in English
  • Live Zoom call support
  • Continues work update
  • Offer both Coding and UI/UX Design
  • Top Quality after sell service


As a final delivery, you will receive bug free website source code in a ZIP file. For design + development services, the final delivery also includes the Figma (.fig) file.


For more information, please scroll to the FAQ section just bellow.


Good to go? Click the "Contact Me" button nearby.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Please provide the colors, logos, ideas, content as well as functionality you wish the website or landing pages to have.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you think is the timeline for the project completion?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The categories of the project schedules are based on the amount of work involved on the website. After we converse, I will give you an estimated time of delivery.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is it going to be compatible with mobile devices?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Obviously! I ensure that every single one of my websites is completely responsive and looks amazing both on desktops, tablets and mobiles.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if after the project has been completed, I would like to make some changes?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Changes depend on the package that you select, I also provide a limited number of revisions before the project is closed owing to your satisfaction with the results.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you help register a domain for me or host my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Even though I don’t offer hosting or domain registration services, I can assist you in selecting suitable services and ensure you get them activated.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What would be the usual project pricing?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The pricing of a project depends on the project complexity. Please let’s discuss your requirements so we can come up with an individualized estimate.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What will happen if during the implementation phase of the project, for some reason, I will want more features?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: In case of such concerns, I am flexible and ready to learn new features. Of course, we can talk details about the timeline and cost as we progress, however, it may affect such estimates.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What does the phrase "figma UI/UX" mean?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Let's say you are unsure about the design of a website you have an idea for. Alternatively, you wish to improve or create something similar to an example website. Figma then enables us to design a website prototype on an artboard. We are able to view a preview of the finished website.

packageList.title: Conversion Booster
packageList.description: Design Html landing page (max 7 sections) Scroll Animations

packageList.title: Ultimate Edge
packageList.description:
Figma Design + Code.

1 page with max 10 sections and 1 sub page

openGraph.title: design modern html landing page or website development

reviews.comment: 5 stars isn't enough to describe how good of a job Mehidi did for me on my website. I gave him a very specific vision of what I was looking for and he nailed it exactly correct while also helping with getting the website active as well. He went above and beyond in every way. I could've paid five times the amount I did for his service and would've been thrilled for what he did. I couldn't recommend him highly enough and will absolutely be looking to use him for any website needs in the future. Thank you very much!

seller_response.comment: Thanks a ton for the awesome feedback and the tip! Really appreciate it!

reviews.comment: Mehidi Hasan is an absolute rockstar! His development skills are top-notch, delivering clean, efficient, and innovative solutions every time. What really sets him apart, though, is his insane work ethic—it's truly unmatched. Mehidi goes above and beyond, often exceeding expectations and delivering results ahead of schedule. He’s not just reliable but also a creative problem solver who always finds a way to get the job done. If you're looking for someone who combines expertise with dedication, Mehidi is your guy. Highly recommend! 🚀👏

Mehidi Hasan delivers excellence yet again! This was my second time working with him, and he absolutely nailed it. His ability to understand complex requirements and execute flawlessly is remarkable. Mehidi’s attention to detail and commitment to producing high-quality work are unparalleled. On top of that, his communication throughout the project made the entire process seamless. It’s rare to find someone with both incredible technical skills and a relentless work ethic. I’ll definitely be coming back for future projects. Highly recommended! 🙌👏

Mehidi Hasan has been outstanding in the website development project, demonstrating exceptional code expertise and professionalism. His proactive communication and timely delivery made the collaboration seamless and enjoyable. I wholeheartedly recommend him for his skill and courteous demeanor.

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your great feedback :D

reviews.comment: Mehidi Hasan is an exceptional website developer! He EXCEEDED our expectations with his professional work and comprehensive documentation. His deep understanding, proactive communication, and high level of cooperation made the whole process a breeze. 👍

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your feedback! It was a pleasure working with you, and I’m glad I could exceed your expectations. Looking forward to future collaborations! 😊

reviews_snippet.comment: Mehidi delivered top-notch work with outstanding documentation, surpassing all expectations. His professionalism combined with his language fluency and deep understanding made working with him a fantastic experience. Quick responsiveness sealed the deal for a seamless project—absolutely recommend! 1000/10!!

Wow! He was absolutely amazing. We jumped on a zoom call, we talked at length about what we needed to accomplish (him even starting on the design and building it right before my eyes), and was extremely responsive to my needs. He also came up with great ideas and taught me a couple things that drastically improved my original idea for the design. 

His English is absolutely amazing, it was really easy to communicate with him on the zoom call, which made the whole process very easy and seamless.

Absolutely amazing experience, I HIGHLY recommend for anyone who wants a responsive, smart, and creative design for their landing page, or any other HTML/CSS design project.

Amazing seller! I had a very difficult project, and he not only delivered exactly what I needed, but went above and beyond to make sure I was satisfied. I definitely plan to hire him again for my next project. I highly recommend you use this seller if you need any website work done.

This is the first time using Mehidi and it's been exceptional and won't be the last. He fully understood the requirements and delivered excellent work in designing our new website.  Having somebody who listens and fully understands the objective is really important and Mehidi has a strong grasp of marketing strategies on top of his design skills. Will be using again.

Great Endresult with proactive inputs from mehidi
Zoom meeting helped a lot with trust and formulating my wish
As we all now fiver artists always say yes to your projects and say they understood it and can do it….but with mehidi its actually true!

consultationData.description: Please prepare with clear requirements and some examples. In the meeting, I will offer suggestions and more clear ideas. So if you can explain me better at the meeting you will get the best job done,
